name: a lonely recycling droid hears a distress signal from deep within the ruins
name_original: a lonely recycling droid hears a distress signal from deep within the ruins
description:
a game about abandonment, solace and despair

thanks to inu, nico, ellie, kusaedonai and momo for playtesting and helping me see it through.

and to claire c for trusting her music on my little story <3

made in bitsy, trax embedded using bitsymuse-ui

writing and level design by kiara (me)
